Description: Marketing and Business development executive- FMCG- personal hygiene segment.Job location : Dubai, UAEReporting to : Head of BD & Managing Director.Skills
Skills: The Ideal candidate should be from the FMCG industry specifically from the personal hygiene segment (handwash, sanitizers, bodywash etc). should have at least 4-5 years experience in the UAE market with good contacts with leading departmental chains- carrefour, Nesto etc. Contacts with pharmacies and hospitals if any would be an added advantage.
Desired nationality: preferably Indian but open for other nationalities as well.

a valid UAE driving license and should be mobile.
good communication skills and a pleasing personality
should be a go-getter and tenacious.
willing to take up new challenges.
willing to travel extensively inside UAE.
Must be familiar with retail shelf sales concepts etc.
Experience with all retail outlets like Nesto, Lulu, Carrefour etc.
Customer relationship and sales management.
